# Payment Data Enrichment Service

## Project Context
This is a cloud-native microservice for enriching payment/transaction data with merchant categorization, geolocation, and data normalization. Built for high throughput and low latency to showcase skills for Senior Software Engineer roles.

## Technology Stack
- Java 17+ with Spring Boot 3.x
- AWS Services (DynamoDB, S3)
- Redis for caching
- Maven multi-module structure
- Docker & Docker Compose
- GitHub Actions for CI/CD
- JUnit 5, Mockito, TestContainers
- Prometheus & Grafana for observability
- OpenAPI/Swagger for API documentation

## Architecture Principles
- Microservice architecture with clear separation of concerns
- Low-latency design patterns (caching, async processing)
- RESTful API best practices
- Comprehensive error handling and logging
- Cloud-native deployment ready
- Test-driven development approach
